      • addSingleton

        public static void addSingleton(java.lang.String word,
                                AutomatonBuilder a)
        Extends automaton a, so that it accepts also this word. Created states are prefixed by 'q_'
        Parameters:
        word - : word to be accepted
        a - : target automaton

      • addSingleton

        public static void addSingleton(java.lang.String word,
                                AutomatonBuilder a,
                                java.lang.String namePrefix)
        Extends automaton a so that it accepts also this word. Created states are prefixed by namePrefix followed by '_'
        Parameters:
        word - : word to be accepted
        a - : target automaton
        namePrefix - : prefix to use for state names.

      • addFiniteSet

        public static void addFiniteSet(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> finiteLanguage,
                                AutomatonBuilder a)
        Extends automaton a so that it accepts also this finite language created states are prefixed by namePrefix followed by '_'
        Parameters:
        finiteLanguage - : set of words to be accepted
        a - : target automaton

      • addFlatExp

        public static void addFlatExp(java.lang.String exp,
                              AutomatonBuilder a)
        Extends automaton a so that it accepts also language denoted by exp created states are prefixed by namePrefix followed by '_'
        Parameters:
        exp - : flat regular expression (only letters and *)
        a - : target automaton

      • addFlatExp

        public static void addFlatExp(java.lang.String exp,
                              AutomatonBuilder a,
                              java.lang.String namePrefix)
        Extends automaton a so that it accepts also language denoted by exp created states are prefixed by namePrefix followed by '_'
        Parameters:
        exp - : flat regular expression (only letters and *)
        a - : target automaton
        namePrefix - : prefix to use for state names.

      • transpose

        public static void transpose(Automaton original,
                             AutomatonBuilder mirror)
        Transpose automaton Note : mirror is cleared before the operation.
        Parameters:
        original - : automaton to be transposed
        mirror - : receive the transposed automaton

      • determinize

        public static void determinize(Automaton nfa,
                               AutomatonBuilder dfa)
        Determinization of nfa automaton. Note : dfa is cleared before the operation.
        Parameters:
        nfa - : non deterministic automaton (to be determinize)
        dfa - : receive determinization result
